text: Lewis Wray of Russellville was recently inducted into the National Cutting Horse Hall of Fame! A great achievement. The tribute honors his contributions to the sport, but I'll always remember him as my Backfield Coach at @RHS_cyclones. From all us old Cyclones, "Congrats, Emma!"

Arkansas agriculture feeds our state, America, and the world. Congrats to Jim and Michele Pigeon on being named the 2022 Benton County Farm Family of the Year! Lifelong stewards of the land, they raise cattle and poultry and also grow various plants! @ArFB

Welcome home! Today, Arkansas celebrated the return of @arkansasguard's 142nd Field Artillery Brigade from their deployment in Southwest Asia as part of Task Force Spartan. It was a special homecoming in Bentonville for our soldiers and their families. Thank you for your service! https://t.co/gpqDMy7i3b

#HonorThem: 78 years ago, Allied forces stormed Normandy's shores to defend the world from tyranny. With a pivotal moment for freedom and liberty ahead of them, the #GreatestGeneration never wavered from the mission. They determined the fate of our future. Heroes always. #DDay78 https://t.co/JsYNjhiPXZ

Lt. General Darryl Williams is a patriot and leader of the highest standard. He will be an excellent commander of U.S. Army Europe/Africa, and I look forward to his nomination being swiftly moved forward.
